text: Pro tip for "BingeWorthy". If a friend asks for ideas on something to watch, share a link to your profile page. It works without being logged-in. It's a smart way to share your favorites, and it also helps spread the word about BingeWorthy, which is nice. This is my profile page. A few more. Leo Laporte. NakedJen, Jake Savin, Liza Sperling, Francine Hardaway, Steve Garfield, Peter Politi.
